mods.abstract: Two color half sheet (black and red on white) announcing the 1st Annual Holiday Folk Festival with the Nitty Gritty Dirt Band, the Osborne Brothers, Doug Kershaw, Doc Watson, John Hartford, Grandpa Jones and others at the Take-It-Easy Ranch on May 24-26. Poster features metal photoplates of Nitty Gritty Dirt Band, the Osborne Brothers, Doug Kershaw, Doc Watson, John Hartford, and Grandpa Jones. For additional information about this poster see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/32431.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
